content: this pattern is available for free this pattern is available in my group on facebook group link is below thank you pattern includes written instructions for interlocking double filet written instructions for mosaic overlay pre-ticked charts for mosaic overlay aprox size is small throw 47 x 55 this can vary depending on chosen yarn hook size and gauge please note yarn amounts will be higher for mosaic overlay due to tails and if you opt to add an envelope border please keep in mind i have gone to every effort to make sure this pattern is correct knowing this we are still all human and if you find anything that is incorrect please take note and let me know thank you this is a downloadable pattern as such no refunds will apply thank you so much for your interest in my pattern facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/1097663133929336/ © 2022 lucille schubert all rights reserved
